## üß≠ Objective: 
Explore how population growth varied across different colonial empires in the 19th century using historical datasets.

## Prompt:

## üì• Data Setup
```{webr-r, lab01a}
library(tidyverse)

pop_data <- read_csv(here::here("assets/datasets/colonial_population.csv"))

pop_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = population, color = empire)) +
  geom_line(size=1) +
  labs(title = "Colonial Population Growth (1800‚Äì1900)",
       y = "Population (millions)", x = "Year") +
  theme_minimal()
```
